name: What? The Hell?
description:
Join Hyra in Hell's hotel. Yup... just a hotel...but in Hell. Hades, Inferno or call it Underworld, you got the point. Follow her little adventure when she doesn't know why she was sent to Hell and she must find it out. There will be challenges to face, obstacles to overcome and puzzles to solve.

Inspired by games like Yuppie Psycho and Legend of Zelda, among others, "What? The Hell?" has a retro appeal, something-between-8-and-16-bit style. The game was made as an University Degree project by only one developer.

Synopsis

Dying is nothing more than changing residence, literally. When the main character, Hyra, dies from unknown circumstances, the question is: where is she going to be transferred? To the city of paradise or to the city of punishment? Well, her new address now is Hotel 44, Hell.

Hyra finds that very wrong ...This makes no sense whatsoever to her. So the only option is to investigate why she is in the wrong place and how to escape from there.

Gameplay
  • Exploration: Walk through the Hotel and find items that can be picked up. Loot chests, wardrobes and cupboards.
  • Conversation: Talk to NPC's to gather information and clues.
  • Puzzles: Use items you found wisely, find hints in order to progess.
  • Skill: Avoid traps by anticipating them, heal if you are low on health, be cautious overall.
Install Instructions Download the .RAR file Extract the .RAR file Open the extracted file and double click on "What, The Hell.exe" Thankyou for playing! Take care <3
